features: PRESCRIPTION-STRENGTH PROTECTION: Active lives need Degree Men Clinical Protection Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant. This antiperspirant for men delivers prescription-strength wetness protection
MOTIONSENSE TECHNOLOGY: This clinically proven antiperspirant provides a unique motion-activated, odor-control technology with 2x stronger sweat protection than regular antiperspirants
READY FOR WHAT’S NEXT: Take on the day with Degree Men Clinical Protection Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant stick. Simply twist, glide, and move

body.description: Degree Men Clinical Protection Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant delivers prescription-strength wetness protection with 72-hour sweat and odor control to keep you feeling dry and fresh. Our breakthrough MotionSense technology works in sync with your body, all day long. This antiperspirant deodorant releases a clean, masculine scent every time you move. The powerful, prescription-strength antiperspirant deodorant responds when you need it most, so you can stay confident without having to worry about slowing down. Only Degree MotionSense technology keeps you fresher with every move. Degree MotionSense technology works like this: unique microcapsules sit on the surface of your skin. When you move, friction breaks those microcapsules, and they release more fragrance. So, every time you move, MotionSense keeps you fresh and free from odor. You can be confident you’ll enjoy non-stop protection from sweat and odor by this antiperspirant for men. Stay fresh and feel clean from morning to night. Simply twist, glide and get moving. Stay dry, cool, and confident thanks to Degree Men Clinical Protection Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant. At Degree, we want to inspire the confidence in everyone to move more and go further.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Degree Clinical Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant keeps excessive sweating under control, keeping you in the game with a clean, masculine scent. However you move, move with the confidence of 72-hour sweat protection from Degree.

72-HOUR NONSTOP SWEAT PROTECTION This clinical antiperspirant deodorant delivers unstoppable sweat and odor protection that helps keep you moving with confidence. MOTIONSENSE TECHNOLOGY Degree's breakthrough MotionSense technology reacts directly to movement to keep you feeling fresh and protected. UNSTOPPABLE CONFIDENCE Degree doesn't stop working, no matter how much you move. MOVING TOGETHER TOWARD REUSE At Degree, we're committed to creating the most reused and inclusive products possible. As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we’re making it easier for you to recycle our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging.

Degree Advanced Sport Defense Antiperspirant Deodorant Dry Spray, 3.8 oz Degree Sport Antiperspirant, 2.7 oz Degree Cool Rush On-The-Go Deodorant Wipes, 25 ct Main Benefit Stay guarded against sweat and odor with 48-hour protection so you can finish fresh and dry. Our Sport Defense Antiperspirant Deodorant features our breakthrough MotionSense Technology that doesn’t stop working, no matter how much you move. These antiperspirant deodorant wipes work overtime to shield you from sweat and odor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unmatched Sweat and Odor Protection for Active Men
reviews.reviewText: As an active guy who enjoys sports and physical activities, finding the right antiperspirant has always been a priority for me. Recently, I decided to try the Degree Men Antiperspirant Deodorant Sport Strength, and I must say, it has exceeded all my expectations.The standout feature of this antiperspirant is its incredible 72-hour sweat and odor protection. Whether I'm hitting the gym, playing sports, or simply going about my day, this antiperspirant keeps me feeling fresh and dry for an extended period, giving me the confidence to stay active without worrying about unpleasant body odor.Degree Men Sport Strength is like having prescription-strength antiperspirant in a convenient pack of two. It stands up to even the most challenging situations, making it an ideal choice for men with active lifestyles who need reliable protection that lasts.I particularly appreciate the pleasant and subtle fragrance of this antiperspirant. It's not overpowering or overwhelming, ensuring that it doesn't clash with any cologne or scent I may choose to wear. The deodorant keeps me smelling clean and fresh throughout the day, no matter how intense my activities are.Another great feature is that it doesn't leave any sticky residue or stains on my clothing. The formula goes on smoothly and dries quickly, providing a clean and comfortable feel on my skin.Additionally, the compact packaging of the pack of two is perfect for tossing into my gym bag or travel kit. It's a space-saving and travel-friendly solution that ensures I never run out of my favorite antiperspirant.In conclusion, this deodorant is a game-changer for active men like me. With its prescription-strength protection, long-lasting freshness, and reliable performance, it's become an essential part of my daily routine. If you're looking for an antiperspirant that can keep up with your active lifestyle, I highly recommend giving this one a try. You won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewText: This does a great job and does not have a strong scent. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good multi-day anti-perspirant
reviews.reviewText: There are two things I like about this product:1) It is very effective over a multi-day period. It may take more than one application before you achieve multi-day protection. Once done, even showers will not reduce effectiveness2) it is also suitable for the male "nether regions". It is scent free and it does not use alcohol as a carrier solvent. This is particularly important for sensitive skin.It is important to apply this product and other similar products in the evening, prior to bed rest as this allows the product to soak into the sweat glands before being washed away with the sweat or a shower.

reviews.reviewText: Ok so I bought this product for my teenage and preteen boys and when i tell you that this product works wonders for my boys they love it and my nose love it 👍🏾👍🏾 we highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Men - DO NOT BUY
reviews.reviewText: First off the scent is not masculine. It has a fruity, mango scent which even my wife thought was meant for her and even she didn't like the scent at all. Neither did I.Second the image is false advertisement and should be updated - This is not a pack of 2 deodorants. It only comes with one as you can see with the associated image.I'm a male that weighs around 230 lbs and wore this for a day, went to work, and went to the gym. I wreaked worst than if I wore a "natural" deodorant with no parabens etc... or if I would've worn nothing at all. This did not keep me smelling good throughout the day and even interfered with how I smelt after I took a shower and tried to re-apply a different deodorant.Hands down one of the worst deodorants I've ever tried and will not be purchasing again in the future. If you're a male I suggest you take this as a warning and stay away.
El producto es bueno pero pedi el 2 pack y solo me llego uno. Espero que el vendedor me pueda mandar el otro que pedi....
Im in singapore, it lasts a really long time compared to everything else i have tried.
